bug.author: PureWaterSun
bug.summary: After I install Ciphey, I run the command ‚ÄúCiphey ‚Äù.The system return an error.
bug.description:
Describe the bug After I install Ciphey, I run the command ‚ÄúCiphey ‚Äù.The system return an error. ================= 192:~ hh$ ciphey Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/bin/ciphey", line 5, in from ciphey.ciphey import main File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ciphey/init.py", line 1, in from . import common File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ciphey/common.py", line 5, in import cipheycore File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cipheycore/init.py", line 13, in from . import _ciphey_core_py ImportError: dlopen(/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cipheycore/_ciphey_core_py.so, 2): Library not loaded: /usr/local/opt/python@3.7/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.7/Python Referenced from: /usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cipheycore/_ciphey_core_py.so Reason: image not found My environment <denchmark-h:h2>Version Name: ciphey Version: 5.3.2 Summary: Automated Decryption Tool Home-page: None Author: Brandon Author-email: brandon@skerritt.blog License: MIT Location: /usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages Requires: base58, pyyaml, click, appdirs, yaspin, click-spinner, rich, typing-inspect, base91, cipheycore, pybase62, flake8, pylint, loguru, cipheydists Required-by:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Name: cipheycore Version: 0.2.9 Summary: Home-page: None Author: Cyclic3 Author-email: cyclic3.git@gmail.com License: None Location: /usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages Requires: Required-by: ciphey</denchmark-h>
Name: cipheydists Version: 0.3.22 Summary: A collection of distributions, character sets and dictionaries for use in ciphey Home-page: None Author: Cyclic3 Author-email: <denchmark-link:mailto:cyclic3.git@gmail.com>cyclic3.git@gmail.com</denchmark-link>
License: None Location: /usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages Requires: Required-by: ciphey I don't know how to solve this problem, please help meÔºÅÔºÅÔºÅ

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.82. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/Ciphey/Ciphey>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

Per the bug report template, we have this section: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/wiki/Common-Issues-&-Their-Solutions>https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/wiki/Common-Issues-&-Their-Solutions</denchmark-link>
If you had filled out the bug report, you would have seen we have issues with Mac OS which are solved by using Docker. This GitHub issue does not follow our template, it is a duplicate of another issue, and this issue is solved in our documentation so I am closing it :)
